amendment.description: Amendment strengthens prohibitions against animal fighting by ensuring the law applies to all US territories.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in House Report 115-679 to strengthen prohibitions against animal fighting by ensuring the law applies to all US territories.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 359 - 51 (Roll no. 202).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Roskam.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 359 - 51 (Roll no. 202).
